title: SHIB to Get More Scarce as Key Exchange Expands to Shibarium
detailedContent: ShibaSwap, the decentralized exchange (DEX) associated with the Shiba Inu (SHIB) cryptocurrency, said Thursday it was live on the Shibarium blockchain, an Ethereum layer 2 built by the SHIB token team.
tags: Shiba Inu, Trading, dexs
author: Shaurya Malwa

title: CME Looks to Take On Binance and Coinbase, Could Launch Spot Bitcoin Trading: Report
detailedContent: Futures powerhouse Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) plans to offer spot bitcoin trading to clients as demand for the product mounts among market participants, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.
tags: Trading, Investing, Markets, CME, Binance, Coinbase
author: Shaurya Malwa and Omkar Godbole

title: Coinbase to Target Australia's Self-Managed Pension Funds: Bloomberg
detailedContent: Coinbase is developing a service that will specifically target Australia' self-managed pensions sector, the exchange’s Asia-Pacific Managing Director John O’Loghlen told Bloomberg.
tags: Regulations, Coinbase, Crypto, Australia, Tax, Pension Funds
author: Amitoj Singh

title: Bitcoin Has Best Day in 2 Months as Markets Anticipate a ‘Summer of Easing'
detailedContent: Bitcoin (BTC) posted its biggest single-day gain in nearly two months on Wednesday as weak U.S. economic data raised the probability that the Federal Reserve (Fed) will join its advanced nation peers in easing monetary policy with rate cuts over the summer months.
tags: Bitcoin, Markets, central banks
author: Omkar Godbole

title: Eclipse Labs Promotes Vijay Chetty to CEO Nearly a Week After Neel Somani's Ouster
detailedContent: Eclipse Labs' appointed Vijay Chetty as its new CEO, after Neel Somani stepped down last week after sexual assault allegations. Chetty was the chief growth officer at the firm before his promotion.
tags: Sexual Assault, Sexual Misconduct, layer 2
author: Sam Reynolds

title: Canada’s ‘Crypto King’ and Associate Arrested, Charged With Fraud in Alleged $30M Ponzi Scheme
detailedContent: Two Canadian men have been arrested and charged with fraud for allegedly swindling investors out of $40 million CAD – approximately $30 million USD –i n a crypto and foreign exchange investment scheme.
tags: Regulations, Crime, Canada, Fraud, Ponzi
author: Cheyenne Ligon

title: Izzy Englander's Millennium, Paul Singer’s Elliott Among Bitcoin ETF Holders
detailedContent: More big names have revealed allocations into the spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds.
tags: Spot bitcoin etf, Silicon Valley Bank, Millennium Management
author: Helene Braun

title: Bitcoin Hits $66K as Soft Inflation Data Sparks Crypto Rally
detailedContent: Crypto markets rallied on Wednesday as softer-than-expected U.S. inflation data jolted digital assets from their stupor.
tags: Markets, Market Wrap, Bitcoin, Inflation, Swissblock technologies, Bitfinex
author: Krisztian  Sandor

title: U.S. House's McHenry Says Senate May Be Swayed if Many Democrats Back Crypto Bill
detailedContent: The result of next week's expected vote on U.S. legislation to regulate the cryptocurrency industry will strongly influence the odds the U.S. Senate gets on board, said Rep. Patrick McHenry (R-N.C.), the chairman of the House Financial Services Committee and a leading advocate for crypto legislation in the waning months of his career in Congress.
tags: Regulations, House Financial Services Committee, Legislation
author: Jesse Hamilton

title: Sweeping ‘Bitcoin Rights’ Bill Becomes Law in Oklahoma
detailedContent: Oklahoma Governor Kevin Stitt signed a sweeping ‘Bitcoin Rights’ bill into law on Monday, enshrining Oklahomans’ legal right to mine, transact with, and self-custody cryptocurrencies and boosting the state’s reputation for being a friendly destination for crypto companies and investors.
tags: Regulations, Oklahoma, state laws, lobbying, Bitcoin
author: Cheyenne Ligon

title: The Protocol: Lido Backers vs EigenLayer
detailedContent: I must admit to choking on my tequila drink a couple weeks ago after hearing the phrase "investable asset class" applied to the category of digital tokens known as meme coins. But for many investors and projects, the opportunity is being taken quite seriously. See our riff below.
tags: The Protocol, EigenLayer, Vitalik Buterin, Lido, Memes, meme coin, meme coins, ethererum
author: Bradley Keoun

title: Incoming Vanguard CEO Won't Reverse Decision Not to Launch Bitcoin ETF
detailedContent: Salim Ramji, set to take the reins at Vanguard from outgoing CEO Tim Buckley on July 8, quickly poured cold water on the idea that he has intentions for the asset management giant to offer its own spot bitcoin ETF.
tags: Bitcoin ETF, Vanguard
author: Stephen  Alpher

title: Rafael Cordón: Safeguarding Elections With Bitcoin
detailedContent: Rafael Cordón is concerned about how we’re going to protect the truth in the age of AI and disinformation. The Guatemalan tech CEO and engineer began thinking about this issue in the wake of Russia’s interference in the 2016 U.S. presidential election. But never did he consider he might create a technology that would protect a presidential election in his home country from being undermined via a flagrant attempt to tamper with physical voting documents. Yet, this is what he’s done with Simple Proof, an immutable record keeping system that safeguards data using the Bitcoin blockchain.
tags: Bitcoin Halving
author: Frank  Corva

title: Protocol Village: Cyber, Formerly CyberConnect, Unveils Social-Focused Layer 2 on OP Stack
detailedContent: May 15: Cyber, the just-unveiled rebranding for the developer formerly known as CyberConnect, has launched its own layer-2 network in the Ethereum blockchain ecosystem, describing it as the "first L2 for social." According to the team, the new chain relies on "top modular solutions. Cyber integrates Optimism’s OP Stack, EigenDA and custom features to provide low fees, high TPS and a user-friendly experience." According to a blog post: "AltLayer will manage the rollup’s technical launch, ongoing management, operations and future upgrades. With AltLayer’s help, Cyber is one of the first OP Stack Chains with Plasma Mode deployed to mainnet. Plasma Mode enables OP Stack chains to leverage alternative data availability (DA) layers to Ethereum Mainnet, significantly reducing their transaction costs while minimizing tradeoffs to security and decentralization."
tags: The Protocol, Blockchain, Ethereum, Bitcoin, Tech, Blockchain Technology, EVM, Protocol Village
author: Bradley Keoun

title: Brothers Accused of $25M Ethereum Exploit as U.S. Reveals Fraud Charges
detailedContent: Two brothers have been arrested by the U.S. Department of Justice for attacking the Ethereum blockchain and stealing $25 million of cryptocurrency during a 12-second exploit, according to an indictment unsealed on Wednesday.
tags: MEV, Exploit, DOJ, Ethereum
author: Sam Kessler and Nikhilesh De

title: House Resolution to Overturn Controversial SEC Rule Likely to Pass in Senate: Sources
detailedContent: A House proposal to revoke the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 is likely to pass through the Senate in a vote on Thursday, multiple people familiar with the situation told CoinDesk.
tags: Regulations, SEC, House of Representatives, Senate
author: Nikhilesh De and Jesse Hamilton

title: Halving Impact and Macro Shifts Create Tailwinds for Bitcoin
detailedContent: The fourth Bitcoin halving in April reduced the new bitcoin issuance rate to 3.125 BTC every ten minutes, sparking significant interest and speculation. Since then, Bitcoin has been down from its highs, with some investors concerned that the days of higher BTC prices are in the distant future.
tags: Opinion, Crypto Long & Short, Bitcoin, Halving, Institutional Adoption, institutional investor, Bitcoin Price
author: Paul Marino

title: The Ethereum Staking Opportunity
detailedContent: Ethereum is the largest proof-of-stake network by market cap. Currently, 32.5 million ($99 billion) ETH has been staked, and the amount of staked ETH has grown by 78% since Ethereum’s Shanghai Upgrade in April 2023.
tags: Opinion, Crypto Long & Short, Institutional Adoption, Institutional Investment, Ethereum staking, Restaking
author: Eliezer Ndinga

title: Nasdaq, After Pivoting Crypto Ambitions to Tokenized T-bills, Sees Staffers Exit Amid Delays: Sources
detailedContent: Stalled or canceled cryptocurrency projects at Nasdaq – including a previously unreported effort to tokenize U.S. Treasury bills – have led to members of the exchange giant's digital assets team no longer working at the company, according to three people with knowledge of the matter.
tags: Exclusive , Nasdaq, Tokenization, Treasury Bills
author: Ian Allison

title: Humanity Protocol Raises $30M at $1B for Decentralized Identification to Rival Worldcoin
detailedContent: Humanity Protocol, a zero-knowledge decentralized identity project looking to compete with Worldcoin, said it was valued at $1 billion in a seed funding round led by Kingsway Capital.
tags: Fundraising, seed funding, Identity Verification
author: Sheldon Reback
